titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the home port of the battleship USS MISSOURI should be Naval Station, Long Beach.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials.

committee.subcommittee: Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials
committee.name: House Armed Services

bill.summary: 5/5/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that Naval Station, Long Beach, in Long Beach, California, should be the home port of the battleship U.S.S. Missouri.
